get.summary: Retrieve the Login Form from the external tools
get.description: Retrieve the Login Form from the external tools

200.description: Login Form is returned to the external tool user

post.summary: Post the external tool user credentials and redirect/callback url to validate the user
post.description: Post the external tool user credentials and redirect/callback url to validate the user

200.description:
If user credentials validation is successful, a JWT token is returned to the callback url as a query parameter named token.
Otherwise Login Form is returned with an error message and user can retry to login.
